body: Hey I’m here browsing through good hentai but at the same time I’m looking for someone who might have a friend who translate this series for me [Tokie Hirohito] Kyuuai Vector I like the artist so if anyone knows somebody who can translate this it would be great
I take it Piero is an Ass guy.
As a paizuri fan this is pretty good. But agreed. We don't need to keep reupping chapters already on here
Yeah, a new version with the corrected order of the chapter 9 pages and the extra chapter would wrap this up perfectly.
